project_descr: Sthrenghtening Volunteerism for Development in China through the Beijing 2008 Olympic Volunteer Action Plan

outputs.output_descr: The project consists of three core components and objectives based on initiatives before, during and after the Games: 1) To support and facilitate the Beijing Olympic Games Volunteer Work Coordination Group Office (BOGVWCGO), Beijing Organizing Committee of the Olympic Games (BOCOG) and Beijing Committee of the China Communist Youth League (BCCCYL) in implementing successfully the Beijing Olympic Volunteer Program Action Plan, especially the Training Operational Plan. 2) To enhance environmental awareness through volunteerism with the involvement of communities and civil society organizations to support the "Green Olympics" concept.  3) To engage volunteers, including Olympic Volunteers, through a national volunteer campaign to support and contribute to achieving the MDGs and enhancing a Xiao Kang Society.
